document.full_text: one of the workers struggling to avert a disaster at japan's crippled nuclear plant was exposed to a high radiation dose that may increase the risk of cancer, a u.n. atomic agency official said wednesday.
document.title: japan atom plant worker received high radiation: iaea
lines_and_colors: one of the workers struggling to avert a disaster at japan's crippled nuclear plant was exposed to a high radiation dose that may increase the risk of cancer, a u.n. atomic agency official said wednesday.
